mapper.select: select menuName , sum(orderCount) totalOrderCount , dense_rank() over (order by sum(orderCount) desc) menuRank from orderTemp group by menuName order by menuRank asc

select c.cocktailName from cocktails c inner join taste t on c.cocktailTaste = #{cocktailTaste} or c.cocktailFlavor = #{cocktailFlavor} where t.memberId = #{memberId} order by case when c.cocktailTaste = #{cocktailTaste} and c.cocktailFlavor = #{cocktailFlavor} then 1 when c.cocktailTaste = #{cocktailTaste} or c.cocktailFlavor = #{cocktailFlavor} then 2 else 3 end
mapper.sql: select m.memberId, case when to_number(substr(m.birthday, 1, 4)) between extract(year from sysdate) - 29 and extract(year from sysdate) then '20대' else '기타' end as ageGroup, ot.menuName, ot.orderCount, row_number() over (partition by m.memberId order by ot.orderCount DESC) AS rn from member m join orderTemp ot on m.memberId = ot.memberId where to_number(substr(m.birthday, 1, 4)) between extract(year from sysdate) - 29 and extract(year from sysdate)
mapper.select: select ageGroup, menuName, sum(orderCount) as totalOrderCount from AgeGroup20 group by ageGroup, menuName order by totalOrderCount desc
